title: #165: Analyzing "The Antecedent Report" in The Teacher's Pet
description:
The RCP team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) continue their discussion and analysis of Lyn Dawson's case and The Teacher's Pet. Jim and Laura forensically deconstruct and analyse the so-called "Antecedent Report," Chris Dawson's two page police statement which was written on 16 August 1982, seven months after Lyn went missing.


If you have any information about Lyn Dawson's disappearance or the historical sexual offences at the Sydney high schools please call Crimestoppers on 1800 333 000 


If you would like to learn more about coercive control:

www.laurarichards.co.uk/deep-diving-coercive-control/


#HerNameWasLynDawson
